text:
Southern Charm Savannah’s Dinner Party Takes a Threatening Turn

Hospitality isn’t a given in Savannah. Southern Charm Savannah’s cast is still obsessed with Nelson Lewis’ past, and we kind of can’t blame them? The guy basically pulled…
